name: Crust (exopunk, Kaminos, Mous, Nectanebo)
description:
Controls:

KEYBOARD

Movement - WASD/Arrow keys

Aim - Mouse

Grapple - Left click

«We fell from the burning sky, on a sheet of water we landed. We may not have much of our thrusters, but we still trust our mighty Grapple!» Team:

Alex Podaras - Programming [exopunk]

Theodore Moustakas - Sound design / Music [Mous]

Vasilis Kaminaris - Art [Kaminos]

Alex Kaminaris - Art [Nectanebo]
